translation.en: Who are you? What do you want?
Zane. Wake up, Zane. Cole's about to beat your high score.
I just had a terrible nightmare.
translation.es: - Tuve una pesadilla. - No fue un sueño, Zane.

translation.en: Oh I'm afraid it's not a dream, Zane. It's real.
translation.es: - Tuve una pesadilla. - No fue un sueño, Zane. Es real. ¡Cole superará tu puntaje!

translation.en: Cole's about to beat your high score!
Not that. I had a nightmare
translation.es: Eso no. Soné que pasará algo terrible.

translation.en: There was an evil serpent with a weapon, and it zapped me with it, and there was an ice castle, and a dragon, and...
translation.es: Una serpiente me golpeó con un arma, y había un castillo de hielo, un dragón y…

translation.en: Zane, when was the last time one of your visions actually came true?
translation.es: Zane, ¿cuál de tus visiones se ha hecho realidad?

translation.en: All of my visions have come true.
Like the vision about the Titanium Dragon, and the vision before that, about the Green Ninja,
translation.es: Como la del dragón de titanio, y la del ninja verde,

translation.en: and the time before that, about the-- Okay, okay, but this is different.
translation.es: - y la de… - ¡Está bien! Pero esto es diferente.

translation.en: Now, seriously, Cole's about to beat your Lava Zombie score,
translation.es: Cole superará tu puntaje en Lava Zombie

translation.en: and I don't wanna miss it. So come on.
Get the guy on the left.
Congratulations, Cole. That is quite an achievement.
translation.es: Felicitaciones, Cole. Es todo un logro.

translation.en: Ah, good. Because my arm is pretty sore. I'm sore just from watching.
translation.es: - Bien, porque me duele el brazo. - A mí me duele solo de ver.

translation.en: Know what I'm thinking?  Hot tub!

translation.es: Kai, un poco de calor, por favor.

translation.en: Fighting all those bad guys, saving Ninjago.
translation.es: Peleando contra los malos, salvando Ninjago.

translation.en: I can't believe we're back to this.
translation.es: No puedo creer que volvamos a esto.
¿Qué? Tras cada victoria, se vuelven flojos, conformistas, descuidados.
Tras cada victoria, se vuelven flojos, conformistas, descuidados.

translation.en: We're recovering. We're resting our muscles.
translation.es: Es la recuperación, descansar los músculos.
- Bueno, ¿quién lleva la cuenta? - ¡Yo! Mírense. Se ablandaron.

translation.en: You do nothing all day but play video games and eat cake,
translation.es: No hacen más que jugar videojuegos y comer pastel,

translation.en: It's the sacred Bell of Divinity.
translation.es: Es la Campana Sagrada de la Divinidad.

translation.en: You have become soft. Lazy. Flabby.
translation.es: Se han vuelto blandos, perezosos, flácidos.

translation.en: Okay, that's getting a tad personal.
translation.es: Bueno, eso ya es algo personal.

translation.en: Nobody has gone soft, Master Wu. - I promise you. -
translation.es: Nadie se ha ablandado, maestro. Se lo prometo.

translation.en: the hills around this monastery have been populated
translation.es: las colinas que nos rodean  han sido pobladas por depredadores muy agresivos.

translation.en: by a species of highly aggressive predator.
translation.es: han sido pobladas por depredadores muy agresivos.

translation.en: The first monks built the walls extra tall to keep them out.
translation.es: Los primeros monjes hicieron muros altos para aislarlos.

translation.en: Many monks were lost. What's in the box?
translation.es: - Perdimos muchos monjes. - ¿Qué hay en la caja?

translation.en: In order to survive, the monks became faster, stronger, more cunning.
translation.es: Para sobrevivir, los monjes se hicieron más rápidos, fuertes y astutos.

translation.en: To this day, it is a test that every ninja must face.
translation.es: Hasta hoy, es una prueba que todo ninja debe enfrentar.

translation.en: they must survive five minutes  in a room with one of these.
translation.es: ¡deben sobrevivir cinco minutos en una habitación con uno de estos!

translation.en: Oh, he had me going there for a sec.
Heh, who knew Wu had a sense of humour?
We're... We're as sharp as ever.
A ninja's guard is never down!
translation.es: Un ninja nunca baja la guardia.
Está listo para lo que sea.

translation.en: We have to do something, Lloyd!
Let's just go and talk to him. Like reasonable ninja.
translation.es: Vamos a hablar con él, como ninjas razonables.

translation.en: Master Wu, is there anything that we can do,
translation.es: Maestro Wu, ¿hay algo que podamos hacer, como grupo,

translation.en: as a group, that would prove to you that we have not gone soft?
translation.es: que pruebe que no somos blandos?

translation.en: So you could stop booby- trapping stuff?
Prove me wrong by defeating me in combat.
But I thought you said fighting never proves anything.
translation.es: Pero dijo que pelear no prueba nada.

translation.en: It will prove you can still fight.
We can't fight you. You're our master.
Come on guys, we can take him. You wanna rumble? You got the rumble.
translation.es: Vamos, podemos ganarle. Si quiere pelea, ¡la tendrá!

translation.en: Your elemental powers no longer obey you. Hyah!
translation.es: Tus poderes elementales ya no te obedecen.

translation.en: Well, I haven't forgotten how to use mine.
translation.es: ¡Pues yo aún sé usar los míos!

translation.en: Huh? How'd he get up there?
- Maybe Wu's right. - I think so.
We need a quest. - Yeah. - Uh- huh.
Oh, you gotta be kidding me.
I looked it in the eye!
translation.es: - ¡Vete! - Lo miré a los ojos. Subtítulos: David Marín
